main event: Three students observed an unidentified flying object in the sky over Kerrville, Texas, on 9 October 1960.
interesting points: The object was first seen low in the eastern sky and moved slowly upward., It changed colors and appeared self-luminous., The students thought it was too bright and steady to be a star., The observation lasted for 6 minutes., The object was reported to have been moving in a steady course.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object that changed colors and was self-luminous
